data.title: Fun for the whole family.
data.body: The NERF Rival Charger MXX-1200 was a great Christmas gift for my son... and me! When you hear the motor spin up you get excited. It has a 12-round capacity and it is motorized, it beats hand-pumping single shots. Hits somewhere around 100 FPS so it doesn't hurt but you know you're hit. Easy for younger kids to reload, and fun to use â€“ a must-have for any NERF enthusiast!
